title: Introduction to SQLAlchemy
summary:
The goal of the tutorial is a broad-based introduction to SQLAlchemy,
spanning the Core and ORM components as well as the systems that
underlie them. The tutorial takes the "harder" approach teaching from
fundamentals first, emphasizing details on how the library interacts
with the database and SQL and concluding with an introduction to the
ORM, providing a solid perspective for continued study.
